title: Kelly's Roast Beef with Jon Gabrus and Carl Tart (LIVE)
itunes:title: Kelly's Roast Beef with Jon Gabrus and Carl Tart (LIVE)
description:
Jon Gabrus (Action Boyz, High and Mighty) and Carl Tart (Grand Crew, The Flagrant Ones) join the 'boys to discuss Mitch's hometown of Quincy and bulkie rolls before a review of Kelly's Roast Beef. Plus, the 'boys go Sippin' Up to Boston with a special guest. Recorded live at The Wilbur in Boston on 5/7/22.

Sources for this week's intro:

https://www.bostonmagazine.com/arts-entertainment/2013/01/02/good-will-hunting-oral-history/

https://abcnews.go.com/Entertainment/stories-making-good-hunting/story?id=51592706

https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119217/quotes/qt0408072

http://archive.boston.com/ae/food/restaurants/articles/2011/05/18/at_kellys_roast_beef_sandwiches_rule/

https://kellysroastbeef.com/history/

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
